message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product at a price of $11,500. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with your purchase.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have a limited budget and need to be mindful of it.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000? This is a fair offer considering the value this product provides.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $9,800?
